headline: Crown Bay Redevelopment in St. Thomas Could Be A Game Changer For Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL)
summary: Earlier this month, the Virgin Islands Port Authority, Royal Caribbean Group, and Cruise Terminals International signed a landmark agreement to redevelop the Crown Bay District in St. Thomas into a modern, mixed-use tourism hub with upgraded commercial, recreational, and cultural facilities. This public–private project is expected to reshape the local cruise ecosystem by creating new jobs, expanding opportunities for small businesses, and deepening Royal Caribbean’s integration into a key...
